statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_time FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT log_id, transaction_time, transaction_details FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_details ->> 'status' = 'success';
SELECT log_id, user_id FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY user_id, transaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_time >= '2022-01-01T00:00:00Z' ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_details -> 'amount' > 100 ORDER BY transaction_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT audit_id, transaction_id, action FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'CREATE';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails ORDER BY audit_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_timestamp FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND transaction_details ->> 'status' = 'approved'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT transaction_id, action, audit_timestamp FROM audit_trails ORDER BY audit_timestamp
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs LIMIT 10
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 12345
SELECT user_id, action, details FROM disputes WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%'
SELECT user_id, timestamp, resolution FROM disputes WHERE resolution IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, action, details FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 123 AND action = 'login'
SELECT details, timestamp FROM transaction_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND action LIKE '%updated%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 456 AND action IN ('create', 'update')
SELECT user_id, details FROM disputes WHERE user_id = 789 AND reason = 'Fraudulent Activity' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, details FROM compliance_records WHERE action LIKE '%update%';
SELECT * FROM dispute_resolution WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT action, COUNT(*) FROM audit_trails GROUP BY action ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT user_id, details FROM compliance_records WHERE action = 'approved' AND date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT MAX(dispute_id) AS max_dispute_id FROM dispute_resolution
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_id <= 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT log_id, event_time FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM dispute_resolution LIMIT 5 OFFSET 3;
SELECT full_name FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, event_time, action FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'CREATE';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE event_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id FROM dispute_resolution WHERE transaction_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND action != 'DELETE';
